BodyName: Subcommittee on Planning, Dispositions and Concessions

Items.Title: Uniform land use review procedure application no. C 110272 HAQ, an Urban Development Action Area Designation and Project located at 58-03 Rockaway Beach Boulevard and the disposition of the city owned property, Borough of Queens, Council District no. 31.  This matter is subject to Council Review and action pursuant to ยง197-c and ยง197-d of the New York City Charter and Article 16 of the General Municipal Law.
Items.ActionText: This Land Use Application was Hearing Held by Committee
Items.MatterName: UDAAP, 58-03 Rockaway Beach Blvd, Queens (C 110272 HAQ)

Items.Title: Application no. 20115746 HAK, an Urban Development Action Area Project located at 1413 Pitkin Avenue, Council District no. 41, Borough of Brooklyn.
